        parent - The parent.

        parent - The parent.
        childTagName - The child tag name.
        grandchildTagName - The grandchild tag name.

      • getChildElementByName

        public static Element getChildElementByName​(Node parent,
                                            String tagName)
        Returns the first occurrence of a child element with the specified tag name. Note: only immediate children are candidates (not all descendents).
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent node
        tagName - The child tag name
        Returns:
        The child Element or null if none found

      • getXML

        public static String getXML​(Document doc)
                     throws TransformerConfigurationException,
                            TransformerException
        Convert a Document (DOM) into an XML String.
        Parameters:
        doc - The Document
        Returns:
        The XML String
        Throws:
        TransformerConfigurationException - If there is a configuration issue
        TransformerException - If unable to transform the Document
